jMEF

Class ExponentialFamily<ParamX extends Parameter,ParamD extends Parameter>

  • java.lang.Object
    • jMEF.ExponentialFamily<ParamX,ParamD>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bernoulli, BinomialFixedN, Laplacian, MultinomialFixedN, MultivariateGaussian, MultivariateIsotropicGaussian, Poisson, Rayleigh, UnivariateGaussian, UnivariateGaussianFixedVariance

    public abstract class ExponentialFamily<ParamX extends Parameter,ParamD extends Parameter>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Version:
    1.0

        Returns:
        \f$ F(\mathbf{\Theta}) \f$

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • DivergenceF

        public double DivergenceF(ParamD TP,
                 ParamD TQ)
        Computes \f$ div F \f$.
        Parameters:
        TP - natural parameters \f$ \mathbf{\Theta}_P\f$
        TQ - natural parameters \f$ \mathbf{\Theta}_Q\f$
        Returns:
        \f$ div F( \mathbf{\Theta}_P \| \mathbf{\Theta}_Q ) = F(\mathbf{\Theta}_P) - F(\mathbf{\Theta}_Q) - \langle \mathbf{\Theta}_P-\mathbf{\Theta}_Q , \nabla F(\mathbf{\Theta}_Q) \rangle\f$

      • G

        public abstract double G(ParamD H)
        Computes \f$ G(\mathbf{H})\f$
        Parameters:
        H - expectation parameters \f$ \mathbf{H} \f$
        Returns:
        \f$ G(\mathbf{H}) \f$

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        \f$ \nabla G(\mathbf{H}) \f$

      • DivergenceG

        public double DivergenceG(ParamD HP,
                 ParamD HQ)
        Computes \f$ div G \f$.
        Parameters:
        HP - expectation parameters \f$ \mathbf{H}_P\f$
        HQ - expectation parameters \f$ \mathbf{H}_Q\f$
        Returns:
        \f$ div G( \mathbf{H}_P \| \mathbf{H}_Q ) = G(\mathbf{H}_P) - G(\mathbf{H}_Q) - \langle \mathbf{H}_P-\mathbf{H}_Q , \nabla G(\mathbf{H}_Q) \rangle\f$

      • density

        public double density(ParamX x,
             ParamD T)
        Computes the density value \f$ f(x;\mathbf{\Theta}) \f$ of an exponential family member.
        Parameters:
        x - a point
        T - natural parameters \f$ \mathbf{\Theta} \f$
        Returns:
        \f$ f(x) = \exp \left( \langle \mathbf{\Theta} \ , \ t(x) \rangle - F(\mathbf{\Theta}) + k(x) \right) \f$

      • BD

        public double BD(ParamD T1,
        ParamD T2)
        Computes the Bregman divergence between two members of a same exponential family.
        Parameters:
        T1 - natural parameters \f$ \mathbf{\Theta}_1\f$
        T2 - natural parameters \f$ \mathbf{\Theta}_2\f$
        Returns:
        \f$ BD( \mathbf{\Theta_1} \| \mathbf{\Theta_2} ) = F(\mathbf{\Theta_1}) - F(\mathbf{\Theta_2}) - \langle \mathbf{\Theta_1} - \mathbf{\Theta_2} , \nabla F(\mathbf{\Theta_2}) \rangle \f$

      • KLD

        public abstract double KLD(ParamD LP,
         ParamD LQ)
        Computes the Kullback-Leibler divergence between two members of a same exponential family.
        Parameters:
        LP - source parameters \f$ \mathbf{\Lambda}_P \f$
        LQ - source parameters \f$ \mathbf{\Lambda}_Q \f$
        Returns:
        \f$ D_{\mathrm{KL}}(f_P\|f_Q) \f$

      • GeodesicPoint

        public ParamD GeodesicPoint(ParamD T1,
                   ParamD T2,
                   double alpha)
        Computes the geodesic point.
        Parameters:
        T1 - natural parameters \f$ \mathbf{\Theta}_1\f$
        T2 - natural parameters \f$ \mathbf{\Theta}_2\f$
        alpha - position \f$ \alpha \f$ of the point on the geodesic link
        Returns:
        \f$ \nabla G \left( (1-\alpha) \nabla F (\mathbf{\Theta}_1) + \alpha \nabla F (\mathbf{\Theta}_2) \right) \f$

      • drawRandomPoint

        public abstract ParamX drawRandomPoint(ParamD L)
        Draws a random point from the considered distribution.
        Parameters:
        L - source parameters \f$ \mathbf{\Lambda}\f$
        Returns:
        a point
